title: India FY26 tech revenues seen 6.1 pc up at USD 315 bn, jobs also grow: Nasscom
description: Despite geopolitics-inducing volatilities and changes in the landscape due to artificial intelligence platforms, the Indian tech sector is set to notch up a 6.1 per cent revenue growth in FY26 to USD 315 billion, Nasscom said on Tuesday. In the strategic review of the ongoing fiscal year, Nasscom estimated the overall AI revenues at USD 10-12 billion in FY26, while Nambiar said not all companies report AI revenue.

title: Guj HC issues notices to Central and state govts on PIL flagging AI misuse for deepfake content
description: Ahmedabad, Feb 24 (PTI) The Gujarat High Court on Tuesday issued notices to the Central and state governments on a PIL concerning the misuse of artificial intelligence to create deepfakes and synthetically generated content targeting Constitutional authorities. A division bench of Chief Justice Sunita Agarwal and Justice DN Ray also directed the Gujarat DGP to […]
